publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1689 Michael Matheson: Falkirk High Schools Debating Competition—That the Parliament congratulates the English Speaking Union for organising the school’s debating championship at Falkirk Municipal Buildings; praises the local schools in the area which took part, particularly the eventual winners, Braes High School, and also Denny High School, who reached the final, and acknowledges the assistance of ASDA in sponsoring the event. Supported by: Bob Doris*, Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Alasdair Allan*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Kidd*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-1689 Falkirk High Schools Debating Competition (lodged on 9 April 2008) Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-1689 Falkirk High Schools Debating Competition (lodged on 9 April 2008) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-1689 Falkirk High Schools Debating Competition (lodged on 9 April 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-1689 Falkirk High Schools Debating Competition (lodged on 9 April 2008) Aileen Campbell*
